name: nyu
text: I have the Ray and Nice pete cut outs on opposing strings of my window blinds such that when I close the blinds, Ray informs its time to do this.

name: apocowarg
text: I cut out most of these at work and fit them on a post-it note to make a little Achewood scene. Then I put the post-it note on a shelf just above my computer monitor. I'm a little worried my boss will see The Death Sound and think odd things about me.

name: howard
text:
'Do not expect a reply.'
'Stop camping outside my house'

name: silver_lake
text: Printable, high-resolution PDF of Kut-Me Ups! (the original link to the nice printable PDF file)

name: numberkillinger
text: thanks

name: heccibiggs
text: oh nice

name: pogo
text: I wondered if On-Sate was just jerking us around with the promise of a PDF.

name: pogo
text: On-Star.

name: i_love_kate
text: Son of Tarzan?

name: sp1derbaby
text: George, George, George of the Jungle?

text: ...Boned?

name: cbchillcb
text: Thanks for the link

name: closefriend
text: I cannot even quantify how useful more Kut-Me-Ups would be.

name: dumase
text:
Just another lonely night at closefriend's house.

Won't you be his close friend?

name: tombsgrave
text: Terrorize your players with Achewood minis!  Whip Darth Teodor at your Star Wars RPG players, or inject a hypodermic needle full of terror right into the heart of your next Call of Cthulhu game with The Death Sound!

name: darthemed
text: I read your comment, and it is good. Is so good.

name: heavymetaljesus
text: I do believe that Death Sound would be much more agreeable in Vampire: The Masquerade.

name: ananke
text: Someone sooo make this happen.

name: stuart
text: I was thinking of doing my own house rules Monopoly set with The Death Sound filling the role of the Plankton piece from the Spongebob edition (move forward one space on every snake eyes, game ends upon return to Go)

name: stuart
text: Where the hell did I learn about a Plankton piece? I ain't never played no Spongebob Monopoly.

name: cthulhu235
text: Back when I was married, my ex made magnets outta these. That was the coolest refrigerator I have ever owned.

name: semiquaver
text: Was she your ex at the time?

name: cthulhu235
text: Correction. Back when I was married, which I no longer am, my WIFE made magnets of these.

name: semiquaver
text:
Now I feel like a cock for making a joke out of your divorce.

Man I can't buy you a drink because of Age but the sentiment is there and I can certainly apologize oh fuck

name: gormster
text: Today is Roast Beef's birthday.

name: pseudochron
text: Roast Beef is represented three times in the Kut-Me-Ups.

name: deusoma
text: And yet not ONE Mr. Bear.

name: fancyrat
text:
I had to go back and re-check them after your comment, and not only is Beef in there three times, he's wearing clothes in all of them.How odd.

Also, I wish there was a Mr. Bear too, deusoma.

name: meepmeep
text: god these are so good for my area

name: direhaggis
text: I used the Nice Pete figurine in a Vampire game a few years back. The Death Sound got mixed reviews. What the hell.

name: the_voice
text: Well, he has cut his body.

name: charchar
text: Weekend project for charchar!  Who needs alive people with eggs and testicles when you can chill with the Death Sound?

name: atticusonline
text:
Why is no Vlad? I am hurt by this belittlink!

Is no good!

name: doctorbeene
text: How old is Beef in cat years now?
